alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Knox; Morrow; Richland; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 3:30AM EDT until June 14 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Richland County in north central Ohio... Central Ashland County in north central Ohio... Morrow County in north central Ohio... Southern Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... Knox County in north central Ohio... * Until 415 AM EDT. * At 330 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Polk to Cardington, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Wooster, Ashland, Mount Vernon, Mount Gilead, Millersburg, Berlin, Lexington, Walnut Creek, Loudonville, Fredericktown, Gambier, Sugarcreek, Cardington, Bellville, Centerburg, Shreve, Ashley, Danville and Killbuck. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Holmes; Knox; Morrow; Richland; Wayne
